mapper.sql: l.id as id, l.name as name, l.code_number as codeNumber, l.category as category, l.type as type, l.status as status, l.publish_unit as publishUnit, l.publish_date as publishDate, l.implement_date as implementDate, l.process as process, l.content as content, l.source as source, l.create_id as createId, l.create_time as createTime, l.update_id as updateId, l.update_time as updateTime, l.usable as usable
mapper.select: select , s.name as categoryName, b.name as typeName, t.name as publishUnitName, d.name as sourceName, a.name as statusName from tb_law l left join tb_system_data s on s.code = l.category left join tb_law_type b on b.value = l.type and b.code = l.category left join tb_system_data t on t.code = l.publish_unit left join tb_system_data d on d.code = l.source left join tb_system_data a on a.code = l.status where l.usable = 1 and l.id = #{id}
